# effectiveContentInsets

**Instance Property**

The amount of space added around the content of the container to adjust its final size after item content insets are applied.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var effectiveContentInsets: NSDirectionalEdgeInsets { get }
```

## Getting content insets

- **contentInsets**: The amount of space added around the content of the container to adjust its final size.
